title: How to Use ChatGPT: Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: Go to https://chatgpt.com/auth/login in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://chatgpt.com/auth/login in a web browser. You can use a desktop or mobile browser. If you aren't logged into an existing account, you'll see Log in or Sign up . You must have an email address to sign up for an account.

steps.title: Click Sign up.
steps.content: Click Sign up . This is the right button.

steps.title: Enter your email address and click Continue.
steps.content: Enter your email address and click Continue . You can also sign up using your Google , Microsoft , or Apple account. To do so, click the corresponding button. If you register with a Google, Microsoft, or Apple account, skip to Step 6 once you're signed in.

steps.title: Create a password and click Continue.
steps.content: Create a password and click Continue . Your password must be at least 8 characters long. Be sure to create a secure password .

steps.title: Verify your email.
steps.content: Verify your email. OpenAI will send an email to your inbox that contains a verification number. Open the message from OpenAI, then copy the number into the field to verify your email address. If you don't see it, check your spam or junk folder. If you didn't receive the email, click Resend email .

steps.title: Enter your full name and date of birth, and click Continue.
steps.content: Enter your full name and date of birth, and click Continue . You can use a nickname if desired.

steps.title: Understand the limitations and risks.
steps.content: Understand the limitations and risks. ChatGPT can be used to create resumes and cover letters, solve formulas, and more. While it learns and updates frequently, the system isn't perfect. It's possible to receive false information or answers that seem right but don't make sense. Be sure to fact-check if you're using the answers as a reference. If you want to use ChatGPT to write an essay for school, be aware that there are many ways to detect AI influence in written works. If you simply copy and paste from ChatGPT, it's very likely you'll be caught. Always follow ChatGPT's usage policies ; if you don't, your account may be suspended or terminated.

steps.title: Open https://chatgpt.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Open https://chatgpt.com/ in a web browser. If this is your first prompt, you'll see the prompt field on the home page. Otherwise, click new chat icon in the top-right of sidebar. You can use ChatGPT without being logged in, though features are limited.

steps.title: Enter a prompt or question.
steps.content: Enter a prompt or question. The AI relies on well-written prompts to answer appropriately and correctly. Be as clear and informative as possible; broad prompts usually lead to irrelevant answers. Better prompts will lead to better answers. Here are some popular examplesâ€”edit them as needed: Write an outline : "Write an outline for an essay about positive uses of AI chatbots in schools." "Create an outline for a short 2-page essay on disinformation in the 2016 election." Write an essay : "Write a 2000-word college essay that covers different approaches to gun violence prevention in the United States. Include facts about gun laws and give ideas on how to improve them." "Write a 4-page personal high school essay about the Israel-Palestine conflict, showing that I feel conflicted and want a peaceful solution." Write code : "Write a Python function that reverses a string using a slice." Paste a code and enter "What's wrong with this code?" Write a resume or cover letter : "Create a professional resume template for a lawyer." "Write me a cover letter that includes [your job experience]."

steps.title: Click the arrow icon to send your prompt.
steps.content: Click the arrow icon to send your prompt. You can also press Enter on your keyboard. The AI will begin generating your response immediately. If the prompt is too complex, you may need to break it into parts to avoid hitting the word limit . This can cause the AI to stop mid-sentence .

steps.title: Enter additional information if needed.
steps.content: Enter additional information if needed. If ChatGPT needs more information, you'll be asked to provide it. This may happen on prompts with extensive requests, such as essays or cover letters. Input any other details for your prompt to help ChatGPT generate a proper response.

steps.title: Hover a chat.
steps.content: Hover a chat. You can see a list of all active or past chats in the left panel. Hover the chat you want to delete to see a three-dot button and click that.

steps.title: Click the Delete button.
steps.content: Click the Delete button. This will be the bottom of dropdown menu.

steps.title: Click the Delete button in popup.
steps.content: Click the Delete button in popup. This will confirm your action to delete the chat. If you want to cancel the action, click the Cancel button instead. The chat will be removed from your history.

steps.title: Clear all history (optional).
steps.content: Clear all history (optional). If you have a lot of chats you want to clear all at once, you'll need to do so from your settings. Click the profile avatar at the top-right corner. Click Settings . Click Delete all next to Delete all chats . Click Confirm deletion to confirm. If you want to turn off chat history completely, click the Data controls tab and toggle off Improve the model for everyone .
